page.title: 05THORN'S FARM, ICOMB
page.content: We interviewed Mrs,Peace who lives at Thorns Farm,Icomb.They are new to the area.They came from near Stroud.They own nearly 40 acres.They have 100 sheep.The breeds are Welsh Mountains,Clun Forest,Kerrys and Suffolk rams,so the lambs are Suffolk crosses.There are no cattle on the Farm.It is very busy in the lambing season.The Farm dose not pay for its self yet so Mr.peace works as a Lecturer with the Youth Training Scheme.This year Mr.Peace is also growing swedes and turnips to feed the sheep.
